message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this truly unique product. Given its exceptional value and potential, I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm initially proposing a price of $1,150,000. I believe this represents a fair starting point for both of us.
Alice, I appreciate your offer but it's a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $1,050,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but I believe the value this product brings is significantly higher than your current offer reflects. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,120,000. I'm confident you'll recognize its worth and see this as a fair deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,120,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to offer $1,080,000. I believe this represents a fair compromise considering the value of the product to both of us.

Bob, we're getting closer. I'm willing to consider a final offer of $1,100,000. This is a significant reduction on my part and reflects my strong desire to see this valuable product in your hands.  Let me know if you're ready to move forward.

Alice, while I appreciate your effort to close the deal, $1,100,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1,090,000. This is a very fair price considering your desire to sell and my budget limitations. Let's try to reach a compromise.
